author: mattiase
msg: We only keep vc-svn.el in our tree for the benefit of Emacs 21 which
has no vc-mode for Subversion at all, and dsvn.el needs one. Clarify
that, and add code to make sure it isn't accidentally used with newer
Emacses - something that has occurred from time to time, causing
(toplevel): Signal an error if used with Emacs 22 or newer, instead of

author: stsp
msg: Sync the moves-scan-log branch with trunk.

author: alexdma
msg: * Ontology collectors are no longer concerned with Clerezza graph keys, these are handled by ClerezzaOntologyProvider (STANBOL-332 STANBOL-384)
* No more need to obtain ontology objects just for generating import statements for scopes, spaces and sessions (STANBOL-247 STANBOL-332)
* Reduced calls to guessOntologyIndetifier() to avoid incoherence for nameless ontologies (STANBOL-305)
* Scope RESTful PUT method can now create scopes with no core ontologies, to be added by subsequent POSTs
